name: Infinitbin
overview:
Infinitbin.com is a platform that brings together freelancers/workers and employers, and provides an outsourcing marketplace to make products and services more cost effective. It tends to make it easier for employers to reach a vast majority of able skilled workers from all over the globe.

They’re available and accessible to everyone in the world. There projects costs $10 dollars and above.

Projects can range from categories such as business, marketing, technology and programming, web development, software analysis, writing, translation & advertising, fashion & interior designs, data entry & design, sales & customer support, human resources & legal services, networking & telephone systems, mobile phones, computing, usability testing and all other minor, bizarre and spooky things.

Infinitbin.com uses a milestone payment method where the employer/project manager must have an the maximum budget intended before he can create a project. When a freelancer completes the job and marks as delivered, the employer must mark the project as completed before the funds will be released to the freelancer. The great thing about the platform is that they don’t have a minimum payment method unlike there competitors and they don’t have a clearing period. They wants to pay the world and respects a user’s rights to his funds anytime.
